tool.name: SAGA.grids_tools.3
tool.description: Extract a Grid from a Grid Collection
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayGRIDS False isArrayZ_LEVEL False output_data_GRID $output_data_GRID name SAGA.grids_tools.3 GRIDS $GRIDS Z_LEVEL $Z_LEVEL Z_LEVEL_DEFAULT $Z_LEVEL_DEFAULT RESAMPLING $RESAMPLING prefer $prefer response $response outputType_GRID $OutputSection_GRID.outputType_GRID transmissionMode_GRID $OutputSection_GRID.transmissionMode_GRID

param.name: GRIDS
param.label: Grid Collection
param.help: Grid Collection The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, tiff, png, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: Z_LEVEL
param.label: Z
param.help: Z The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, tiff, png, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: Z_LEVEL_DEFAULT
param.label: Default
param.help: default value if no grid has been selected

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_GRID
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: Extracts grid values from the input grid collection using the chosen interpolation either for a constant or a variable z-level as defined by the z-level input grid.
